author: Wuzzy
long_description:
This allows games and mods to enhance themselves with adding help entries.

IMPORTANT: This mod is only a programmer interface. It does not add any actual help. If you're looking for the full-blown Help system, go to <https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=15912>.
name: doc
short_description: A simple in-game documentation system which enables mods to add help entries based on templates.
title: Documentation System
